componentDescription: Interface for a tabs component that manages active states and tab content rendering

tabs.description: The tabs prop requires an array of Tab objects to render as tabs.

styles.description: Optional prop for providing custom styling options defined by TabsStyles.

isActive.description: Used to track the currently active Tab.

setIsActive.description: React dispatch function allowing to update the currently active Tab.

tabsState.description: An array of Tab objects representing the current state of tabs.

setTabsState.description: Provides a method to update the entire array of tabs' states.
